name: location x,y
content:
Specifies an exact x and y position. 

This block has two sockets for number inputs: x position and y position. Any math block can used in these sockets to allow an exact location on the display to be selected.

examples.description: The block is used several times to make sure that all of the buttons and cars are lined up and evenly spaced for the start of a race.

palette_params.name: y position
palette_params.description: Any number or math block to represent the y position of the location

palette_params.name: x position
palette_params.description: Any number or math block to represent the x position of the location

short_description: Specifies an exact x and y position.
tips: - The display area is 400 pixels x 400 pixels and the upper left corner is (0,0).
